summary: A look-alike commoner is secretly hired to take the place of a poisoned king to save his country from falling into chaos.
cast: Lee Byung-Hun|Seung-ryong Ryu|Han Hyo-joo|In-kwon Kim|Gwang Jang|Eun-kyung Shim|Myung-gon Kim|Jeon Bae-soo|Wook Choi|Seung-wook Choo|Yong-gu Do|Soo-ho Ha|Sung-yong Han|Yi-jin Han|Sung-tae Heo|Guk-hyang Jeon|Shin Jeong-geun|Sung-hee Jo|Ye-rin Joo|Young Ho Joo|Bi-bi Kim|Gil-dong Kim|Hak-joon Kim|Hye-hwa Kim|Hye-won Kim|Jong-goo Kim|Seung-hun Kim|Bang-hyeon Kwon|Eun-soo Kwon|Bong-ryeon Lee|El Lee|Joon-hyuk Lee|Ran-hee Lee|Soo-yong Lee|Yang-hee Lee|Jung-ki Min|Chang-gil Moon|Ji-ah Park|Kyeong-geun Park|Eun-jeong Seo|Jin-won Seo|Ee-yeol Seung|Woon-seob Shin|Seon-hong Song|Joe Thomas|Dong-yun Won|Joon-mo Yang|Soon-woong Yoo
title: Gwang-hae, wang-i doin nam-ja
